text: aur main tumase yah nahin kahata ki mere paas allaah ke khajaane hai aur na mujhe paroksh ka gyaan hai aur na main yah kahata hoon ki main koee farishta hoon aur na un logon ke vishay mein, jo tumhaaree drshti mein tuchchh hai, main yah kahata hoon ki allaah unhen koee bhalaee na dega. jo kuchh unake jee mein hai, allaah use bhalee-bhaanti jaanata hai. (yadi main aisa kahoon) tab to main avashy hee zaalimon mein se hoonga.
